Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Beads
Description: Necklace comprised of nine hundred and six disc-shaped beads made from bone or ostrich eggshell as well as one made from turquoise-coloured enamel. The tomb had been robbed, but the nine rows of beads were found where the person's neck supposedly would have been.
